definition: other name of the Xiangjiang river 湘江[Xiang1 jiang1] in Hunan province
(of water) deep and clear/(of wind and rain) howling and pounding/(of light rain) pattering

sentences.english: Xiaoxiang is one of the numerous images in Qu Yuan's Lisao.
sentences.chinese: 屈骚中有众多的意象，而“潇湘”意象便为其中之一。

sentences.english: When Ch'in-wen took the handkerchiefs to Bamboo Lodge, Tai-yu had gone to bed.
sentences.chinese: 睛雯拿了手绢到潇湘馆时，黛玉已睡下了。

sentences.english: Oblique possession of the sea fog and gloom, Enjoy unlimited Xiaoxiang Road.
sentences.chinese: 斜月沉沉藏海雾，碣石潇湘无限路。

sentences.english: Qingnuan Xiaoxiang, thankful spring, the New Year with us.
sentences.chinese: 情暖潇湘，感恩春天，我们一起过年。

sentences.english: Wind drunk curtain pieces, " Xiaoxiang month."
Listening to the song Xiaoxiang, warm, no early or late collapsed into my heart.
sentences.chinese: 静听那一曲潇湘，陌上花开，不早不晚塌入我的心中。

sentences.english: From pre-Qin days to Qing dynasty, even today, it is existent as a culture sign.
sentences.chinese: 直到今天潇湘仍然作为一种文化符号而存在着。
